Protocols/MBMultipartFormProtocol.html#/.name: data
Protocols/MBMultipartFormProtocol.html#/.abstract: The Data that will be sent, this is optional, if this is not present the fileUrl property must have a value

Protocols/MBMultipartFormProtocol.html#/.name: fileUrl
Protocols/MBMultipartFormProtocol.html#/.abstract: The URL of a file that will be red and sent, this is optional, if this is not present the data property must have a value

Protocols/MBMultipartFormProtocol.html#/.name: mimeType
Protocols/MBMultipartFormProtocol.html#/.abstract: The mimeType of the file, optional, this will be considered only if fileUrl has a value

Classes/MBMultipartForm.html#/s:12MBNetw.name: data
Classes/MBMultipartForm.html#/s:12MBNetw.abstract: The Data that will be sent, this is optional, if this is not present the fileUrl property must have a value

Classes/MBMultipartForm.html#/s:12MBNetw.name: fileUrl
Classes/MBMultipartForm.html#/s:12MBNetw.abstract: The URL of a file that will be red and sent, this is optional, if this is not present the data property must have a value

Classes/MBMultipartForm.html#/s:12MBNetw.name: mimeType
Classes/MBMultipartForm.html#/s:12MBNetw.abstract: The mimeType of the file, optional, this will be considered only if fileUrl has a value

Enums/MBMultipartEncodingResult.html#/s:.abstract: The encoder returns this value if it has saved the form as a file

Enums/MultipartEncodingFailureReason.htm.abstract: The file is not a file but a directory
